This top is very in style. The flower design is so cute and the material is great. However, the straps on the top are a bit uncomfortable and the neckline is oddly shaped.

This tank top fits me perfectly, true to size, and is incredibly comfortable to wear. The lightweight and stretchy material make it a great choice for everyday wear. I appreciate the deep black color of the material and vibrant flower design it has on it. It is exactly as pictured. The quality is also impressive, with no noticeable issues with stitching or unpleasant odors. My only minor criticism is that the vinyl flower was stuck to itself when I first opened the package, but thankfully, I was able to peel it apart and it didn't damage the material. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase and would recommend it to others looking for a comfortable and well-made tank top.
The pop of orange on the shirt is really cool. The shirt is stretchy and a little breathable. The design is nice for the summer.
